text: Conspiracy of Hearts is a 1960 British World War II movie directed by Ralph Thomas and starring Lilli Palmer, Sylvia Syms, Yvonne Mitchell, Ronald Lewis, Albert Lieven, Peter Arne, Nora Swinburne, David Kossoff. It was distributed by Paramount Pictures. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1960 war movies Category:British war movies Category:Movies based on plays Category:Movies directed by Ralph Thomas Category:Paramount Pictures movies Category:Movies set in Italy
title: Conspiracy of Hearts
